title: Hostile Takeover
description: Things were great. Things were grand. Things were wonderful...or at least that's what he'd thought.Callan Wyss knew this was a definitive day. His career was taking off...until a terrifying attack on the country's power structure. Then everything changed. Working for the most powerful man in the country suddenly didn't carry the appeal it had before. Forced to travel without the assistance of technology and surrounded by a conspiracy for which he had no clue about, Callan and his younger brother, Nathan, were thrust into an adventure ensconced with unknown threats and deceit. With help from a few friends and his brother, Callan fights for his life and the life of others around him. Callan and Nathan try to restore power to the country while learning just how alluring the power of technology could be. This adventurous tale launches the reader into the struggles of characters so dependent on their technology, they must re-learn how to interact with others to solve some of the biggest problems they ever encountered. Whether it is love, hate, or remorse, Callan and his fellow travelers deal with an over-abundance of emotions along this thrilling roller coaster ride.
author: Brandon S. Stec
